properties.name: productId
properties.description: Identifier for the package from which this content is offered

properties.name: contentId
properties.description: Identifier for the content to purchase. Relevant only if Product type = PPV

properties.name: productType
properties.description: Package type. Possible values: PPV, Subscription, Collection

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Identifier for paying currency, according to ISO 4217

properties.name: price
properties.description: Net sum to charge – as a one-time transaction. Price must match the previously provided price for the specified content.

properties.name: paymentMethodId
properties.description: Identifier for a pre-entered payment method. If not provided – the household’s default payment method is used

properties.name: paymentGatewayId
properties.description: Identifier for a pre-associated payment gateway. If not provided – the account’s default payment gateway is used

description: Purchase specific product or subscription for a household. Upon successful charge entitlements to use the requested product or subscription are granted.
